Last episode of this year, thanks everyone! ‚ù§Ô∏è

BlenderToday is a weekly live show highlighting the latest news in Blender development, the community, and Q&A. Streaming from the Blender HQ in Amsterdam since 2018, hosted by Pablo Vazquez.

--

Support the future of Blender by joining the Development Fund https://fund.blender.org

#b3d #BlenderToday
* Music by ¬†@Thaehan¬†

--
CHANGELOG - BLENDER TODAY #212

COMMUNITY
* Blender at SIGGRAPH ASIA https://twitter.com/Blender/status/1594662758519345153
* Storypencil tutorial https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b25kfE6qd_c


GEOMETRY NODES
* Geometry Nodes: Image Info Node https://developer.blender.org/rBefcd587
* Geometry Nodes: Add "Exists" output to Named Attribute input node https://developer.blender.org/rB0d3a33e
* Nodes: Allow pasting common nodes between editor types https://developer.blender.org/rBb7a4f79


PERFORMANCE
* Geometry Nodes: Use Mesh instead of BMesh in split edges node https://developer.blender.org/rBe83f46e
* Geometry: Cache bounds min and max, share between data-blocks https://developer.blender.org/rBe8f4010
* Mesh: Use shared cache for derived triangulation https://developer.blender.org/rB511ac66
* Sculpt: Avoid retrieving vertices attribute when flushing positions https://developer.blender.org/rB1677ddb
* Sculpt: Remove some normal calculation with deformed sculpting https://developer.blender.org/rBbf0180d
* Nodes: cache children of frame nodes https://developer.blender.org/rB6239e08
* Nodes: Replace implementation of select next/prev type operator https://developer.blender.org/rB984edb2


UI
* UI: Refactor Node Context Menu https://developer.blender.org/rB2c096f1
* UI: Allow Joining of Tiny Screen Areas https://developer.blender.org/D16522
* EEVEE/Viewport: Make info text when compiling shaders more clear https://developer.blender.org/rBe4871b2
* Fix T102620: Display dynamic socket label in uiTemplateNodeView https://developer.blender.org/D16563
* Fix T102520: Positioning of nodes added via search https://developer.blender.org/rB331e800
* Nodes: Simplify view panning when selecting node https://developer.blender.org/rB97e0cc4
* Fix T98726: Include blender version number in windows shortcuts https://developer.blender.org/rB24bd2d0


CYCLES
* Fix T100537: gaps in Cycles depth pass with transparency https://developer.blender.org/rB3d41d0b
* Cycles: enable AMD RDNA3 GPUs and upgrade HIP compiler https://developer.blender.org/rBc94583c
* Cycles: Enable MetalRT pointclouds & other fixes https://developer.blender.org/rBb0e2e45
* Cycles: Sort properties in Path Guiding panel https://developer.blender.org/rB011c2a3


GREASE PENCIL
* Animation: rearrange grease pencil channels in the main dopesheet https://developer.blender.org/rB7f80b5e


PYTHON API
* libOverride: RNA API: Add option to make all overrides editable in `override_hierarchy_create` https://developer.blender.org/rBa67b33a
* Python API: add Image.save() optional parameters quality and filepath https://developer.blender.org/rB377da3f

snippet.title: CYCLES IMPROVEMENTS - Blender.Today LIVE #211
snippet.description:
BlenderToday is a weekly live show highlighting the latest news in Blender development, the community, and Q&A. Streaming from the Blender HQ in Amsterdam since 2018, hosted by Pablo Vazquez.

--

#b3d

CHANGELOG - BLENDER TODAY #211 

Code Blog:
* Brush & Asset Drafts https://code.blender.org/2022/11/brush-and-draft-assets/ 

TEXTURE PAINT
* Texture Paint: sync adding a new texture slot to the Image Editor https://developer.blender.org/rB1d71f82

CYCLES
* Cycles: Add basic support for using OSL with OptiX https://developer.blender.org/rBe6b38de

* Fix T101270: Object Info - Random not unique for nested instances and curves https://developer.blender.org/rB80f5a5a

ANIMATION
* Cancel Equalize Handles & Snap Keys when no control points are selected https://developer.blender.org/D16390
* NLA: Update context menu to include meta strip operators https://developer.blender.org/rB0b4bd3d
* Add poll messages for marker operators https://developer.blender.org/rB1fdaf74

UI
* Geometry Nodes: Fix alignment of exposed properties in the modifier http://developer.blender.org/D16417
* UI: disable curve map & profile zoom buttons at max/min zoom level https://developer.blender.org/rB4dd19a1
* Gizmo toggle for Movie Clip Editor https://developer.blender.org/rBb557e43
* Fix T102187: Add knife tool in mesh panel https://developer.blender.org/rBb927cc9
* Fix T96481: make color picker RGB display consistent https://developer.blender.org/D14387
* GPencil: Add warning to Outline modifer when no Camera https://developer.blender.org/rBcad11f3
* Fix T102140: Replacement of Noto Sans CJK Font https://developer.blender.org/D16426
* Improved Korean Font Sample https://developer.blender.org/rBa43053a
* Sculpt: Rename Show/Hide operators for consistency https://developer.blender.org/rB659de90
SCULPT
* Sculpt: Change symmetrize merge threshold and expose in workspace panel https://developer.blender.org/rB969aa7b
GREASE PENCIL
* GPencil: Make Sculpt Auto-masking Global and not by Brush https://developer.blender.org/rB4c182ae

PERFORMANCE
* Color Management: Parallelize ImBuf conversion to float https://developer.blender.org/rB1eca437
* Mesh: Avoid calculating normals when building BVH tree https://developer.blender.org/rB276d7f7
UV
* UV: implement copy and paste for uv https://developer.blender.org/rB721fc9c
RIGGING
* Rigify: port the ability to generate Action constraints from CloudRig. https://developer.blender.org/rBAdddf346f1adf49f51351ead084fbb7d5e1a8f9a0
* Rigify: annotate and fix warnings in basic rig components. https://developer.blender.org/rBA01e8af3348fac2babe3b5218dbe4ecdaa0e1eace
POTPOURRI
* Mesh: Convert color attribute operator https://developer.blender.org/D15596
* Fix support for building with ffmpeg lower than 5.0 https://developer.blender.org/rB3e71220
* Asset System: New core type to represent assets https://developer.blender.org/rB1efc94b
ADD-ONS
* Asset Browser and Geometry Nodes in Pie menu https://developer.blender.org/D16323

GEOMETRY NODES
* Attribute Node: support accessing attributes of View Layer and Scene. https://developer.blender.org/rBf61ff2
* Attribute Node: access geometry node instance attributes https://developer.blender.org/rB2f7234
* Geometry Nodes: new Sample UV Surface node https://developer.blender.org/rBe65598
* Geometry Nodes: Set Curve Normal https://developer.blender.org/rB748fda
* Geometry Nodes: Rename Control Point Neighbors Node https://developer.blender.org/rBc3b6e3
* Geometry Nodes: Change order of outputs in topology nodes https://developer.blender.org/rB248def
* Geometry Nodes: Add soft min for points node radius input https://developer.blender.org/rBf9a10e
* Node: Add blend modes to Mix node link drag search https://developer.blender.org/rBf5e1a2

* Nodes: Duplicate Linked operator + User Preference option for Node Tree https://developer.blender.org/rB6beeba


COMPOSITOR
* Realtime Compositor: Implement variable size bokeh blur https://developer.blender.org/rB50943f
* Realtime Compositor: Keep interpolation in Scale node https://developer.blender.org/rB1a9480


UV
* UV: add grid shape source to the uv editor, and add new "pixel" option https://developer.blender.org/rBb7deca


GREASE PENCIL
* GPencil: New Fill Extend lines adjust with MMB https://developer.blender.org/rBbf8507


IO
* IO: support Presets in Alembic, Collada, OBJ, STL, USD importers https://developer.blender.org/rB25b745
* OBJ: add global scale factor import setting https://developer.blender.org/rB42b1a7


POTPOURRI
* Point Cloud: Support applying modifiers https://developer.blender.org/rBb3e6a2
* Linux: enable WAYLAND by default https://developer.blender.org/rBf9ab22
* Preferences: support loading factory settings only for app-templates https://developer.blender.org/rB781d03
* Curve: increase max of order U/V https://developer.blender.org/rB6fac4b
* Images: remove option to choose between BW/RGB/RGBA for multilayer EXR save https://developer.blender.org/rB42f406
* Support environment variables to override USER & SYSTEM resource paths https://developer.blender.org/rBbf4926
* Beginning of automated SVG regression test https://developer.blender.org/rBL63059


FIXES
* Fix T100699: Older preferences from 2.93 wont load https://developer.blender.org/rBfabf4e
* Fix T90782: add uv pack option to specify margin as a fraction https://developer.blender.org/rBc2256b
* Fix T101746: Node copy and paste changes multi-input socket order https://developer.blender.org/rB6c4b72
